scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && export JAVA_HOME=$(/usr/libexec/java_home -v 17) && export PATH="$JAVA_HOME/bin:$PATH" && if [ -f .mvn/wrapper/maven-wrapper.properties ]; then ./mvnw -Ddev.local=true spring-boot:run -Dspring-boot.run.profiles=dev; else mvn -Ddev.local=true spring-boot:run -Dspring-boot.run.profiles=dev; fi
scripts.dev: npm run services:up && npx concurrently -k -n backend,frontend -c green,blue "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
